text.fr: Classifieds are usually the first place you think of when you are getting ready to make a purchase. Whether you want to purchase a vehicle, bed, or pet

text.fr: Vous pouvez vous inscrire au service “Viappel!”, afin de vous tenir au courant le plus rapidement possible, si vous êtes concernés par un événement.
text.en: You can register for the "Viappel!" service, in order to stay informed as soon as possible, if you are concerned by an event.
